Title: An Orphan's Request
Description:
Wow, you look really strong! Would you be able to help me?

My parents were killed by the mean kobyss. When I came here, I left my favorite, most well loved teddy ever behind. 

Could you go get it for me?
ObjectivesText: Retrieve Alyza's Much Loved Teddy Bear from the Hungering Pool in Hallowfall.
CompletionText: I will make the kobyss regret ever setting foot in these lands.
RewardText:
Fine, fine. I guess I don't mind if you come help.

You do actually look big, and strong.
